answers.answer: Hi,The following medical conditions are some of the possible causes of Ear numbness- Diabetes, Peripheral neuropathy, Sensory nerve trauma, Ear infection , Sensory nerve compression, Cold and Cerebrovascular accident . Please consult an ENT surgeon and neurologist if the symptoms persist or get aggravated. Hope this helps you. Take care and regards!

question: I have numbeness on my right ear, since yesterday after i had taken a brain supplement.Is there any relation to my administration of the supplement and my numbness? I can actually still feel the pain when i pinch my right ear.FIY, the numbness is only on the right ear, and no where else.
title: Numbness on my right ear.
